message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than what others might be offering. For you, this product holds significant value, estimated at $100. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it directly from me at a special price of $95. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
